content: let your plants hang out in handmade style in this crochet wall plant hanger basket this plant is made to fit 4 inch plant pots and can easily be adjusted in height by changing the number of repeat rounds that are done a free version of the written pattern is available on my website with ads and an ad-free pdf is available for purchase > subscribe to my newsletter 1 to be notified when new patterns come out a video tutorial is available for this pattern on my youtube channel https //youtu be/82nvfyx0wjs materials 48 yards of medium 4-weight yarn yarn used loops & threads capri eco cotton 4 50 mm crochet hook yarn needle to weave in ends stitch markers scissors 1 https //subscribepage io/mfhzxe
